body: JSNativeContextSpecialization::ReduceJSEqual/ReduceJSStrictEqual: folds JSEqual with null/undefined to ObjectIsUndetectable when one input is null/undefined. Code: JSTypedLowering::ReduceJSEqual (src/compiler/js-typed-lowering.cc) and JSTypedLowering::ReduceJSStrictEqual. In JSNativeContextSpecialization::ReduceJSEqual handles other cases; depends on CompilationDependencies::DependOnNoUndetectableObjectsProtector to guard undetectable checks (see compiler/compilation-dependencies.cc -> DependOnNoUndetectableObjectsProtector).
explanation: Records that typed lowering and native-context specialization fold == null/undefined into ObjectIsUndetectable and that dependencies rely on DependOnNoUndetectableObjectsProtector.
